Package: com.android.builder.core

[Java] Enum VariantType

      • com.android.builder.core.VariantType

      • Type of a variant.

        • Enum Constants Summary

            Enum constants classes 
            Enum constant Description
            ANDROID_TEST
            DEFAULT
            LIBRARY
            UNIT_TEST

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            String getArtifactName()
            Returns the name used in the builder model for artifacts that correspond to this variant type.
            int getArtifactType()
            Returns the artifact type used in the builder model.
            String getPrefix()
            Returns prefix used for naming source directories.
            String getSuffix()
            Returns suffix used for naming Gradle tasks.
            static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<VariantType> getTestingTypes()
            Type of a variant.
            boolean isForTesting()
            Returns true if the variant is automatically generated for testing purposed, false otherwise.
            boolean isSingleBuildType()
            Whether the artifact type supports only a single build type.

        • Enum Constant Detail

          • VariantType ANDROID_TEST

        • Method Detail

          • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public String getArtifactName()

            Returns the name used in the builder model for artifacts that correspond to this variant type.

          • public int getArtifactType()

            Returns the artifact type used in the builder model.

          • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public String getPrefix()

            Returns prefix used for naming source directories. This is an empty string in case of non-testing variants and a camel case string otherwise, e.g. "androidTest".

          • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public String getSuffix()

            Returns suffix used for naming Gradle tasks. This is an empty string in case of non-testing variants and a camel case string otherwise, e.g. "AndroidTest".

          • public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<VariantType> getTestingTypes()

            Type of a variant.

          • public boolean isForTesting()

            Returns true if the variant is automatically generated for testing purposed, false otherwise.

          • public boolean isSingleBuildType()

            Whether the artifact type supports only a single build type.
